cmput301w14t13.project.models.content
Class CommentTreeElementSubmission

java.lang.Object
  cmput301w14t13.project.models.content.CommentTreeElementSubmission

public class CommentTreeElementSubmission
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the same as CommentTreeElement. The difference being that this one is designed to hold a View which it updates as the comment object is mutated. This can be used in activities where comments are created or edited, where the view will be referenced by this class, and the view is updated when an attribute in this class is modified.
